resources.string: Hey! Just some quick tips. So, you will get info like this when you start workout. What this means is, you will be doing workout for 45 seconds, with 15 seconds rest. Try to repeat this workout at least 3 times. If you feel like you can\'t keep on going, try not to stop, just decrease your pace to as low as possible. We\'re in this together, now I wont bother you anymore, good luck and enjoy the process!

Our team of proffesionals will make sure that you get where you want.

Just stay focused, and no matter what, don't give up.

Winners and losers both keep trying, but winners always finish what they started, and losers always find excuse and give up before the finish line.
